de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator

Class ScrollableDialogDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator.AbstractDialogDecorator<ListDialog>
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator.ScrollableDialogDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener, Dialog, DialogDecorator, ScrollableDialogDecorator

    public class ScrollableDialogDecorator
extends AbstractDialogDecorator<ListDialog>
implements ScrollableDialogDecorator, android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener
    A decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain a scrollable content.
    Since:
    3.6.0

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener

        SCROLL_STATE_FLING, SCROLL_STATE_IDLE, SCROLL_STATE_TOUCH_SCROLL

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScrollableDialogDecorator(ListDialog dialog)
      Creates a new decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain a scrollable content.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScrollableDialogDecorator

        public ScrollableDialogDecorator(@NonNull
                                 ListDialog dialog)
        Creates a new decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is designed according to Android 5's Material Design guidelines even on pre-Lollipop devices and may contain a scrollable content.
        Parameters:
        dialog - The dialog, whose view hierarchy should be modified by the dialog, as an instance of the type ButtonBarDialog. The dialog may not be null
